title: State Police in Cobleskill arrest Esperance man for drug charge following traffic stop (New York ...
text: ( Source : New York State Division of State Police ) PRESS RELEASE October 10 , 2015-SP Cobleskill State Police in Cobleskill arrested an Esperance man for Unlawful Possession of Marihuana following a traffic stop that occurred in the Town of
